thread.title: Savannah-Chatham police investigate downtown shooting |
thread.title_full: Savannah-Chatham police investigate downtown shooting | savannahnow.com

author: DispatchDaemon
title: Savannah-Chatham police investigate downtown shooting |
text:
A man was injured Friday night in a shooting in the Yamacraw Village area of Savannah.
Police responded to a shots-fired call at 10:30 p.m. and found a man suffering from a gunshot wound. He was taken to the hospital with non-life-threatening injuries, officials said.
Savannah-Chatham police are investigating the incident. No information about a suspect was available late Friday.
